fi.tuni.tiko

Enum GameLogic.GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GameLogic.GameState>
      • fi.tuni.tiko.GameLogic.GameState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GameLogic.GameState>
    Enclosing class:
    GameLogic

    public static enum GameLogic.GameState
extends java.lang.Enum<GameLogic.GameState>
    Enum to trigger correct events based on what state the game is currently in for instance clicking the play button in main menu will change change the game state to MAP_SELECTION and will trigger all the events needed for the settings screen
